channel.title: CVE Feed for Martin Greenwood -- WPSPX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Martin Greenwood -- WPSPX

item.title: CVE-2024-44034|2024-10-07T14:22:29.231Z -- martin%20greenwood -- wpspx
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Martin Greenwood WPSPX allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects WPSPX: from n/a through 1.0.2.
